content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out, my dog barking, i thought it first it might have been a drone. but then i seen there was more than one! i first seen 2 big lights very bright then it moved up words and i seen 4 lights that hovered for a few seconds then to blinked out and then i just the the 2 one split of to the left one to the right i got the brightest one on video for 5 mins. i was kinda excited because i have seen them several times and was even thrown on the ground 3 years ago by something. i also am a paranormal investigator for over 20 yrs. then it just blinked again and was not there anymore.  i have it on video
content.summary: 4 lights that hovered then 2 left the other brightest one hovered then rapid change of direction caught on video

content.detailedDescription: Had camera ready due to all ufo and paranormal activity around home and at property next door. heard footsteps very close to me that sounded like something or someone heavy with long strides, so i took phone and scanned that area, and immediately went in because i was a bit frightened. didn't check them until next day. i've always heard ufo's and bigfoot had a connection. this is what i captured!! lightened photo's slightly to see better. my video is 3min 22sec. the last couple of seconds has this creature on film for proof!
content.summary: Had camera ready due to all ufo and paranormal activity around home and at property next door. headed footsteps very close to me, so i took phone and scanned that area.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming around the side of my house to the front gate and to look at a party on the street to make sure it's going way over look up in the sky and i seen three fireballs when was kind of look drunk but me but it was very high up it was very humid i can see it very good but it was all fire my surveillance video system caught the images as well i pulled out my phone and started recording off my phone it lasted no more than maybe three minutes and derek got into space
content.summary: It was a fireball three of them very high up in the clouds maybe just below cloud line all three of them load red like they're on fire

content.detailedDescription: i had gotten up to go to the wash room.I heard a louder than usual plane go over head.I live near a major airport.I looked out the window to see if the plane was ok.Instead of plane i saw a cylinder shaped object to the n.E..It was stationary and was shimmering red and green.There was no solid coloring although ufo was whitish silver.It was an upright cylinder and looked like it was floating.I realized i needed to get a picture so my kids would believe me,so i went back to my room to get my cell phone.When i returned a couple of seconds later it was gone.I was told by my mother that when i was younger my parents saw ufo,s treetop level while we where driving home from a late visit with family.My mother said she tried to wake me to see them ,but i would not get up.My mother became very interested in ufo sightings and checked with police and local observatory.The ones she described were not like what i saw.I was not afraid when i saw the ufo today.I felt a calm resignation almost like i was supposed to see it.I only wished that i had seen what my mom and dad saw so many years ago.I look forward to my next sighting ,i want to see more and know more.I realize this is not a very big story to you, but to me it was exciting and awesome.
content.summary: Ufo was seen from upstairs window , stationary in the sky shimmering green and red,but not totally solid color.Ufo was observed about 2 minutes in same place.Went in to my room for camera and it was gone

content.detailedDescription: Went site seeing in san diego she kept taking pictures never noticed any thing till this the next day showing something above my head looks small but clear
content.summary: Wife took a picture of me sitting stil and caught something above my head we didn't see

content.detailedDescription: I used the robert  bingham method and summoned them down! after about a week it worked! i first saw a ufo then i seen little i guess scouts watching me i saw the ufo morph into a plane and tried to get it on tape while doing this i noticed that the ufo would come down to the ground very quickly and i would play back my video i could see the aliens or beins they showed me all kinds of things from cows to just the kids playing i have plenty of video footage as well as screen shots from my videos! the ufo follows me everywhere i go!  i have pictures of humanoid beins as well as the et looking ones and the grey looking ones there are animals too!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw the ufo in the sky and  beins on ground with orbs on camera  still is here is here’s every night i have lots of footage and it follows me everywhere i go

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on antire rd between 44 and high ridge on my way home between 9:30 and 9:40 at night, i noticed 2 red orange (more orange than red) lights in the distance off to my right side in the direction i was heading, i could not tell how far they were exactly but they were surely larger than stars more like the size of a small pill. they were both moving in different directions and then i saw 1 of the lights speed up, this is when i noticed a larger ufo, the light sped into it and vanished. the larger ufo i would say was 3-4 large trees high in the sky and was accompanied by 3 deep green lights attached on the bottom which were dim and looked like it was coming up from the west - south west side of the area a few hundred to several hundred feet away, i'm not good at telling distance but it looked like a bus size flying in the sky coming towards the road and the lights in my car dimmed and my radio lost signal like it was interference until i was about 2 miles down the road, i drive a 2006 ford fusion but this has never happened. i could not make out a color of the larger ufo's body but could see an outline which appeared to me to be long and rounded at the ends. i drove past the area and could no longer view it.
content.summary: 1 long ufo with 3 green lights on the bottom, followed by 2 red-orange lights on a different path until one sped into the larger ufo and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and i happen to look out tthe window,i though it was a bag or some thing drifting in the wind.But it stop dead in mid air right over the cross section of my street.It was very low about 100 feet up and had a bubble like dome.I scurried to my cell phone to get a picture  but it seemed to sense me then it started hauling ass.It vanished and this not my first sighting and in this same area my sister took a picture of one most clear one i ever seen.We was scared to report it like i really don't want to report this.I felt excited about it but not like on the norm because i know there out there.I never actually seen 1 until the past 4-5 years first time in detroit and then livonia .
content.summary: It was a triangle shape and the color of lead.It had a bubble like dome in the center

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch of my apartment building. had my phone out and took a picture of what i thought were chem trails in the sky. i noticed a green orb in the photo i took and i took two more immediately and could see the orb. i have always wondered if it was some kind of reflection in my iphone camera lens since the moon was pretty bright. but i never deleted the photos for over 2 years because i have always wondered if maybe it was something. but i couldn't see this green orb when i was staring in the sky in the same place. only could see it in the photos. you will see that the orb isn't in the same place and if this is a reflection in the lens or something, maybe i had the iphone camera at different angles when taking the picture. i am not sure. but i would love to know what you guys think about this, because i always have.
content.summary: Green orb - i have 3 photos from that night - couldn't see the orb except in photos

content.detailedDescription:
Outside looking for meteor shower and saw v shaped object with lights move very quickly across the sky.  no sound and object was blurry despite excellent visability.  object obscured stars behind it as it went and faded from view before expected due to very clear sky.
isaw a similr thing a few years ago in same place.  fast moving object obscured stars then also.
content.summary: V shaped object with light pattern flew quickly from north to south.

content.detailedDescription: Rather than fill out the form, i came straight to where i can write down my info, since its still strong in my mind. as it happened 8 minutes ago, current time in est exactly 5:00am so time of sight was 4:42am.. so it's known, this is the 1st report i have ever made. i saw what best i can describe as an object (best estimate) 3k ft, no sound. heading north, what looked as a mirror in the sky traveling (again estimate) at bare min 300mph. i live near an airport and go out and smoke about every 45 minutes at night, and always look up at the sky. the only reason i saw it this time, as i was looking straight ahead of me, was (no lights around me, not even street lights) i saw a reflection on the ground, and immediately looked up. best guess, it was of some form (shape similar to cigar, yet pointy at both ends. i estimated it to be a small craft, from my viewpoint and location, size about the size of a cesna 2 seeter in length,(and yes i have knowledge of this plane, as i do have some flight hours in on this exact size of plane) width as well a cesna 2 seeter, but without the wings for comparison. it looked like a solid surface. it was visible for only a few seconds, that's exactly why i did this report first, as fresh as possible. now will fill out forms.
content.summary: See long desc. as it was written exactly 8 minutes after .

content.detailedDescription: Upon driving south on the interstate i got south of plainfield & north of hancock and i saw 1 dot, 2 dots, 3 dots 4 dots, 5 dots like up every second in a straight sideways line. then they went back and unlit the opposite way, same way they lit up. then there were numerous, 4-5,weird ufo style lights that zoomed around the area by the lights that lit up & then disappeared. 2 of them stayed right next to each other & flew to the east. they didn't look like jets or planes. not the same lights or the same way they travel together.Then it went away. i pulled over on the interstate immediately & waited for it to light up again & that was it. i was overcome by desire to be frozen to take it in and feel the connection. i've only had one other experience years ago, much more attached to that one that controlled me for hours, but it was just a few miles north of there.
content.summary: Straight trail of 5 circles perfect straight line in sky & back, plus 4 or 5 numerous ufo's around it & disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On saturday october 14, 2017 at approx. 5:17am i was on my driveway leaving for work and i looked up in the clear sky at the moon and stars. as i looked to the south i saw the big dipper and below were some scattered stars and a bit further down was what looked like a really bright star. i thought maybe it was a planet that was in a closer orbit to the earth. after looking at it for maybe ten seconds it quickly disappeared in a short trail of light in a southern direction, away from me. i was shocked by what i just witnessed, thinking that i might have just witnessed a ufo.
content.summary: I saw a bright star in the southern sky below the big dipper and then it disappeared and trailed off quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 2 or 3:00 a.M. in the morning looking to the west up at the sky when i noticed 3 orange orb type objects traveling north east at a high rate of speed using the clouds as cover they were flying in formation kind of like a triangle but the back 2 were and not aligned exactly one was slightly behind so i believe it was 3 separate craft they made no noise and since they were used in the clouds discover they were low and of that if they were airplanes i'm pretty sure i would have heard some sort of noise and the speed that they were traveling at was faster than anything i've seen.I didn't have a phone on me at the time it was in my room but even if i did i wouldn't have been able to get it out fast enough to take a photograph.However i can't provide a diagram is what is needed
content.summary: I witnessed 3 orange orbs flying n.E  in formation at a high speed use clouds as cover i lost sight in thicker cloud cover  made no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was 20 years old as well as my new wife. we were traveling by car from tucson, az. to los angeles, ca. for our honeymoon. we left in the evening and arrived in la. at about 7:00am.  i was driving and my wife was asleep with her head leaning on her door, i remember this so well because i looked over and worried wether her door was locked when i noticed a very bright red light in the sky thru the passenger window. it was stationery and i was trying to figure out what it was when i noticed a plane flying with it's typical flashing white light slowly pass by in the sky but at a different altitude. the object remained motionless until the plane had passed and then all of sudden it started moving at a speed that was hard to believe then turned towards my car at a 90 degree angle. at this point i was absolutely terrified and feared for my wife and myself. i immediately hit the accelerator and reach a 100 miles per hour when i realized that the object was above my car and matching my speed. i vividly remember looking over at my wife at this point and she was still sound asleep. i was about to scream to wake her when the object accelerated instantly and disappeared straight in front of me in a few seconds. my wife ended up sleeping another 3 or 4 hours while i kept driving, constantly checking the sky for it's return. by the time my wife awoke i had regained enough composer that i merely mentioned that i had seen a ufo and we enjoyed are time in california. i have only told a hand full of people this story in the last thirty years and it still haunts me to the point that the whole time i've been writing this i have had tears in my eye's. no other sightings until 2002 in texas when i believe i was abducted but i will only tell that story to the right person face to face. it feels good to finally let this out, but now i'm also afraid.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright ufo hovered, observed, instant impossible speed, 90degree turn straight towards my moving car.Above car and matched speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I took the children to an evening walk on the beach, we were taking pictures as the sun was setting to our west side, i looked towards the east there was as round ball like a gateway of light, my son asked what is that, is it heaven? i said it’s your grandparents looking over us, i was so mesmerized that it took me an effort ( i m a multimedia professor) to lift my hand and snap a shot of it at the end. there was also a lobster ( which we were playing with) and it’s color was orange, which means it was radiated. i thought about all this when i went home, and looked at the photos, i also saw in one of the photos my son and another anonymous man radiate static from it. 
i have the picture, it is authentic, or else people will think i m crazy!
content.summary: Celestial, a sphere from heaven, a window of fortune

content.detailedDescription: We were going to the wood shed to get wood and i heard the rumbling sound. i looked toward the south  and saw a triangle shaped ufo. we watched it fly right over the top of us heading north. i live at 3500 feet and the mountain behind me is 7700 feet it was below the mountain top and above the trees. maybe 500 to 1000 ft. it was dark so hard to tell'
content.summary: I see them all the time. huge triangle shaped ships flying low below the mountain tos but above the trees. tonight my son saw it also

content.detailedDescription:
Bright white object was first sighted in the southeastern sky about 15 miles northeast of pensacola, florida on 10/18/2017 around 8:45 pm heading in a northeastern direction.
the object appeared to be moving in a zig zag pattern and would speed up and then come to a complete stop, when it stopped a super bright white beam of light emanated from the bottom of the object towards the ground, this happened numerous times during the short time object was observed.
the object then came to a complete stop directly over whiting field naval air station, two more beams of light were observed and then the object disappeared.
we waited outside for close to 45 more minutes but had no further sightings of the object.
content.summary: First sighting was at 8:45 pm northeast of pensacola, florida

content.detailedDescription: I had a headache, i went outside to the balcony to have a breath of fresh air, i sat on the couch with my hand on my head looking up and resting my neck on the edge, i saw a falcon about a few meters away, and behind it far back were a flock of what i thought geese or ducks because they were white, i thought to myself pitifully “ they are probably fleeing from the fire, for i live two hours away from it, in salinas. but as they came closer i came to see that they are not birds, nor planes, and they started spreading, forming shapes of one, two and three, and they were not flying they were hovering, i called on my 9 years old daughter to come out  and get my phone, i taped them on video 1:20sec :) otherwise you’ll say i m crazy.
content.summary: They were passing like a flock of diamonds

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my sister's home in robbinston and being a very clear night, i looked up and pointed out the prominence of the milky way. i then looked a bit north/northeast and saw a bright light/collection of lights. we had seen a similar phenomena, the same time of year, 3 years ago. my sister and i went inside and viewed the object/lights with a pair of binoculars from her back patio. the lights were both hovering but also made rapid movements and then went rapidly back to the original site of hovering. 
this object appeared to be very far away but it was clearly not a celestial body. we remained on her deck viewing the lights for about 15 more minutes and then i left to return to my home in calais. when home, i told my father about the event and we both went outside to see if it was still visible. it was. i took still and digital video images. when i then viewed the stills on the computer, a chevron-shaped object, with lights on its' "wings" was clearly shown. i took multiple photos. what is interesting is that in images that showed the object, no stars were visible surrounding it. however, when i took photos in other parts of the sky, the stars were clearly visible in the photo images. nothing showed up in with the digital video function however.
i would like to note that my father is a retired engineer, mit alumnus, very scientific, practical, and skeptical. he agrees we were viewing a ufo, something he has never seen. 
the object has been hovering for over 3 hours now and its position has only changed by 20 degrees or so and does not follow the path of the constellations.The constellations taurus, auriga, perseus have all passed with the object remaining in the same general vicinity. it  is currently closest to triangula.
if it follows the pattern of 3 years ago, i expect it to be visible more than just this one night in the coming weeks.
content.summary: Image captured with camera boomerang/chevron with lights on wings very far away.

content.detailedDescription: I didn't notice the cloud until a friend oointed it out and i enlarged it. perfect circle shape that is concave. and at the bottom it seems the be the entrance of a hole. does not look like a cloud to me at all. ufo looks to be cloaked.
content.summary: Looks like a cloud until i enlarged photo. looks like a ring that is concaved in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
Black craggily surfaced space ship 100-200 feet above the house with orange plasma like lights. the surface looked very hot with an uneven surface but very black. the lights were in the front and back. just two long cylinder lights that looked like orange moving mist or plasma inside. my girlfriend and i first heard an unusual sound above the house. no sound we had ever heard before. then we saw the object above the house toward the backyard, moving in a se to sw direction and hovering at a very slow speed. we observed it for 9 minutes and could not take our eyes off of it. we were compelled to stare at it and never went for our camera phones, which were in another room.
the size was approximately 50-75 yards long and in a rectangular shape but the front was considerably thinner than the back of the ship. it looked like it could hold at least 100 humans inside.
we realized immediately that this was not from this earth. it had no wings or blades and conventional craft moving at the speed this object was moving would have fallen from the sky.
after about 9 minutes it took off in a sw direction at a speed that was impossible for any conventional aircraft to fly. it was gone in the blink of an eye at 2:24am.
we were amazed and a bit fearful while watching it fly over and we discussed the sighting and the sound  for days and weeks and realized that we had seen an object not of.This world.
content.summary: Black ship flying above house with orange plasma like lighting on 7/25/2015 at 2:15am-2:24am with a washing machine like sounding engine.

content.detailedDescription: husband called me to go outside because there was a large amount of air force jets flying over around us. no jets every fly night in our area of the woods. we are both outside watching these jets encircling something then we saw this massive light that was bright with orange and blue to it then disappeared. then a few minutes later it looked at if jets were chasing something, we saw this gigantic huge bright light and seconds later it went away!
content.summary: Air force jets encircling object and chasing object.  saw two one orange and blue and other bright flash of light

content.detailedDescription: A 19 year old boy was standing outside his rv at night, parked on the side of the street in a residential area of moscow, id.  his girlfriend was asleep inside, and my wife and i were sleeping in the house nearby.  he claimed he looked up at the stars and there were none, instead a massive black object he described as a "d with a triangle" (but from his sketches has a similar shape to a stealth fighter, with no lights and no reflective surfaces.)  it made no sound and woke no one as it proceeded to the west and disappeared into the heavy cloud cover.  the entire incident took only thirty seconds or so, and did not give him time to get anyone else.  it terrified him and made him wonder if it was an ill omen.  i suspect fairchild airforce base might have run some kind of stealth drill over the town at night to see how quiet their new jet is or something, but the witness insists it did not look right to be a stealth jet.
content.summary: Large triangular object flew very low over town under clouds, moved silently east to west

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed this like 5 years ago have been keeping track of it off and on since then has always acted in the same fashion with movements occasionally have seen both and orange and red additional light interacting. during one observation i was accompanied by numerous other individuals. all observe the same movement.
content.summary: On " sky eye" app. this light charts as arcturus. it moves very irregularly. i have observed it all across the country.

content.detailedDescription:
these sightings are being observed by night owl motion detected cameras(3) in the early morning they started on 29 june 2017 and make periodic returns all of july, aug, sept, up to 10 oct.2017
  these tubes of energy and orbs last a few minutes at a time and may appear several days a month and have enough mass to trigger the motion detector to turn on, some events have been recorded on a thumb drive but all events are saved on the recorder. 
  these event have had people walk through them all leave a form of light at the end some have orbs in the and look like eyes.
  the manufactor has no record of any one reporting these observation and all reporting are in in-far red mode with no day light present.
  some of these tubes of energy sway and make 45% bends also the eye looking orbs are only vissable while in the tube of energy. all of them are almost horizontal and show no way to be projected along with dogs in them and they done not react to them.
  i have a vast knowledge u.F.O. and in all of my studding and have a fair knowledge of physic all with a theory of the universe  including both dark energy and dark matter and good understanding of neal's bore work and have no way to explain how these event are  possible, if i am being fooled i don't know how, p.S. for those of you who think it could be spider webs the owner has gone out and wiped the cameras of and when he did you could see the broom sweep it but no sign of him going to the camera or walking away as it was done during an event  
  any one with an explanation please e mail me at twyman. jerry @ yahoo .Com
content.summary: Orbs and transmission of moving orbs in it with eye appearing movment

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the kitchen cooking dinner. a moving light caught my eye on the security camera monitor. i looked at it until it disappeared. reversed dvr and looked at the light orb my eye had caught moving around. thought it might be an insect or bird or reflection of lights from cars in the area. didn't appear to me to be any of those things. first light (orb) i notice was a rectangular light on the driveway in front of the garage which lasted maybe 2 to 3 seconds. after that disappeared, the round orb appeared and was moving around going from the end of the driveway to in front of the garage and back again. once it stopped for a second right in front of the garage and then continued to move about. i was somewhat surprised since i really don't believe in ufos, alien life, or sasquatch, etc. the recorded video is about maybe a couple of minutes long, not sure if i caught all of it. i showed it to my wife and a couple of friends. they also didn't know what it could be. 
in order to get it off the dvr, i used my cellphone to record it. i still have the original video on my security camera dvr. if the video attachment doesn't work, please let me know so i can figure out a way to send it in.
content.summary: Bright moving orb, traveled away from house and back to house, disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My husband and myself were driving south bound around 3pm. i was the driver. as we were traveling we were moving up a small hill and directly over the tree line a flash caught both of our eyes coming from the east to the west in an angled direction toward the ground. as i started to point up at the object that quick it was gone. we both saw it starting and ending at the same time. my husband states he saw it as i did and from the beginning until the end of the sighting. what we saw appeared to be metallic in color and was moving at a fast rate of speed. it appeared in the best way i can describe to have been traveling faster and only slowed down for seconds allowing us to see it momentarily before taking back off again. it had the appearance of a trail of itself as i would describe as if you were filming something like a car and it leaves an imprint of itself behind in a fuzzy image. when it took off it did so fast that it just appeared to have went behind an invisible wall. a few moments after that a black helicopter flew in the same general direction. we pulled over immediately when were able too just to gather our thoughts about what just happened and both of us felt an uneasy feeling as if we weren't supposed to see that. i have seen meteorites come in to the atmosphere but this looked nothing like that at all.
content.summary: A metallic object moving at a high rate of speed appears for a few seconds and then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: Observed one white dot at around 3:10pm. several commercial jets seemed to fly lower than it. several witnesses. then another appeared and slowly moved northwest as the other slowly moved southeast. both appeared to hover for several minutes and then slowly move before i lost site of both. seemed very high, but still in our atmosphere.
content.summary: White objects hovering then slowly moving

content.detailedDescription: Parked my car got out and started walking but northwest and noticed orbs moving oddly in the sky. pulled out my phone camera and started to record the phenomenon, they were reflective on one side dark on the other. i continued to video for about 40 seconds until i put my phone away as the object started to disappear. formations would break off from the original formation and move very quickly towards the west across the sky with other objects chasing behind.  i at first thought the object was birds until i saw how quickly they were moving and how they stayed together in formation very high in the sky.  i was not scared but i didn’t know how to feel it was something i have never witnessed before all i could do was look on in awe.
content.summary: Many many lights floating together, breaking apart and moving quickly before disapering
